name: Dusty Memory
description:
Dusty memory is a memory game, where Dusty, a little dust ball, has the goal of reaching the end of a dirty and forgetful keyboard.

Move Dusty using your Keyboard, however, keep in mind where you're going or you'll get lost.

This is the prototype of the game, if you have any tips please comment below.

Thanks to Matteo Palermo for helping me to create Dusty itself.
